summary: The Devil arranges for a deceased gangster to return to Earth as a well-respected judge to make up for his previous life.
cast: Paul Muni|Anne Baxter|Claude Rains|Onslow Stevens|George Cleveland|Erskine Sanford|Marion Martin|Hardie Albright|James Flavin|Ed Agresti|Murray Alper|Sam Ash|John Barton|Joan Blair|Chet Brandenburg|James Carlisle|Maurice Cass|Chester Clute|Jimmy Dime|Mike Donovan|Jimmie Dundee|Eddie Dunn|Charles Fogel|Joel Friedkin|Curt Furberg|Joe Gilbert|Dick Gordon|Sol Gorss|Robert Haines|Jonathan Hale|Joe Hinds|Noble Johnson|Kurt Katch|Edward Keane|Kenner G. Kemp|Connie Laird|Mike Lally|Fritz Leiber|Carl M. Leviness|Wilbur Mack|George Meeker|Russell Meeker|Harold Miller|Hans Moebus|Georgie Nokes|William H. O'Brien|Bob O'Connor|Sarah Padden|Joe Ploski|Addison Richards|Frank J. Scannell|Lee Shumway|Ray Spiker|Duke Taylor|Jack Tornek|Arthur Tovey|Archie Twitchell|James Van Trees|Ben Welden|Russ Whiteman
title: El diablo y yo
